viber.Event¶

class viber.Event(event, message_token, timestamp, chat_hostname=None, silent=None, user_id=None, desc=None, user=None, type=None, context=None, subscribed=None, message=None, sender=None)¶

Bases: viber.base.ViberObject

This object represents an incoming event.

Note

At most one of the optional parameters can be present in any given event.

event¶

The event’s unique identifier.

Type:viber.enums.EventType
message_token¶

Optional. Unique identifier of the event.

Type:str
timestamp¶

Optional. Time when message was created.

Type:datetime.datetime
chat_hostname¶

Optional. Chat hostname

Type:str
silent¶

Optional. Is message silent.

Type:bool
user_id¶

Optional. User unique identifier.

Type:str
desc¶

Optional. Description for falture events.

Type:str
user¶

Optional. User instance for subscribed and conversation_started event.

Type:viber.User
type¶

Optional. Type for conversation_started event.

Type:str
context¶

Optional. Context for conversation_started event.

Type:str
subscribed¶

Optional. Is user subscribed for conversation_started event.

Type:bool
message¶

Optional. Message attached to event.

Type:viber.Message
sender¶

Optional. User who send the message.

Type:viber.User
Parameters:
  • event (viber.enums.EventType) – The event’s unique identifier.
  • message_token (str, optional) – Unique identifier of the event.
  • timestamp (datetime.datetime, optional) – Time when message was created.
  • chat_hostname (str, optional) – Chat hostname
  • silent (bool, optional) – Is message silent.
  • user_id (str, optional) – User unique identifier.
  • desc (str, optional) – Description for falture events.
  • user (viber.User, optional) – User instance for subscribed and conversation_started event.
  • type (str, optional) – Type for conversation_started event.
  • context (str, optional) – Context for conversation_started event.
  • subscribed (bool, optional) – Is user subscribed for conversation_started event.
  • message (viber.Message, optional) – Message attached to event.
  • sender (viber.User, optional) – User who send the message.
